title: Ticket #4920: Improve glexec error messages
description:
When we follow-up with sites on glexec failures, we have precious little information to give them. A typical message from ShadowLog looks like this: 

Error from glidein_9364_681548592@n2wn24.pi.infn.it: error changing sandbox ownership to the user: condor_glexec_setup exited with status 768 and the following output: [gLExec]:  LCMAPS failed.;            The reason can be found in the syslog.; Glexec exited with status 203; retrying in 30 seconds.; [gLExec]:  LCMAPS failed.;            The reason can be found in the syslog.; Glexec exited with status 203; retrying in 30 seconds.; [gLExec]:  LCMAPS failed.;            The reason can be found in the syslog.; Glexec exited with status 203; retrying in 90 seconds.; [gLExec]:  LCMAPS failed.;            The reason can be found in the syslog.

It would be convenient if we also got:

  • The failed job ID (so we can correlate this with the user log)
  • The DN of the user.
  • The proxy's expiration time.
